thread.title: Experienced Sales Professional Keith Fowler Joins D.A. Davidson & Co. as Managing Director

author: cnbc.com
title: Experienced Sales Professional Keith Fowler Joins D.A. Davidson & Co. as Managing Director
text:
BOSTON--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- D.A. Davidson & Co. announced today that veteran financial professional Keith Fowler has joined the Equity Capital Markets group as a Managing Director in Institutional Sales. As D.A. Davidson continues expanding its Institutional Equities business, Fowler’s addition bolsters the firm’s equity sales capabilities.
“Keith is an important part of our team as we continue strengthening our full-service platform,” said Brit Stephens , Managing Director and Head of Sales, Trading and Capital Markets for D.A. Davidson. “Keith’s experience, expertise and strong relationships will help us to remain a leader, offering high value products and exceptional service to our institutional clients.”
Fowler is part of a team of D.A. Davidson professionals in Boston who provide equity trading, institutional sales and equity research. He joins the firm with extensive experience, most recently with Nomura in Boston. He earned an MBA in finance from Loyola University Chicago and a bachelor of business administration degree, with a finance major, from the University of Texas.
D.A. Davidson & Co.’s Equity Capital Markets group provides capital markets services and products that include investment banking, institutional sales, trading, research and corporate services. The firm’s industry-driven research team offers award-winning research and is supported by a dedicated group of sales and trading professionals.
About D.A. Davidson Companies
D.A. Davidson Companies is an employee-owned financial services firm offering a range of financial services and advice to individuals, corporations, institutions and municipalities nationwide. Founded in 1935 and headquartered in Montana, with corporate offices in Denver, Los Angeles, Portland and Seattle, the company has more than 1,300 employees and offices in 26 states.
Subsidiaries include: D.A. Davidson & Co., the largest full-service investment firm headquartered in the Northwest, providing wealth management, investment banking, equity and fixed income capital markets services and advice; Davidson Investment Advisors, a professional asset management firm; D.A. Davidson Trust Company, a trust and wealth management company; and Davidson Fixed Income Management, a registered investment adviser providing fixed income portfolio and advisory services.
For more information, visit dadavidson.com or Twitter: @DADavidsonCo .
